full_description:
Xiaomi Redmi SonicBass Wireless Neckband Earphone

Xiaomi Redmi SonicBass Wireless Neckband Earphone comes with a 9.2mm dynamic driver that delivers superior sound quality and bass response for music listening. It features dual mic environmental noise cancellation and a waterproof rating. Keep yourself entertained with long hours of music, movies, and video feeds. The Redmi SonicBass delivers 12 hours of uninterrupted music playback. You can listen to your favorite music for longer. And it has a 20% battery reminder function. It is equipped with fast and stable Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity. It has a multi-function button and gets things done without taking your phone out of the pocket.

Dual-Mic Environmental Noise Cancellation

The Xiaomi Redmi SonicBass Wireless Neckband Earphone offers clear voice quality during calls and only gets better with dual-mic ENC. The dual-mic ENC suppresses environmental noise during calls and makes your voice crisp and clear on the receiving end.

IPX4 Rated Splash & Sweat Proof

Redmi SonicBass neckband comes with an IPX4 rating which makes it perfect to play your music as you sweat it out in the gym. Designed for extra durability with protection against splashes and spills.

The Xiaomi Redmi SonicBass Wireless Neckband Earphone comes with a 03-month warranty.

full_description:
Xiaomi Mi Line Free Wireless Neckband Earphone

The Xiaomi Mi Line Free Wireless Neckband Earphone is a accessory that blends modern technology with ergonomic design to provide an excellent listening experience. This wireless earphone, with its stylish neckband design and magnetic earbuds, provides not only style but also functionality, providing secure and pleasant usage even after lengthy use. When not in use, the magnetic earbuds may be conveniently stored around your neck, eliminating tangling and keeping your headphones within easy reach. The Xiaomi Mi Line Free Earphone, powered by Qualcomm's QCC5125 audio chipset and equipped with Qualcomm's aptX Adaptive technology, sets a new bar for wireless audio quality. With 80ms of latency, you can enjoy smooth audio and video synchronization, whether you're watching movies or playing games, for an immersive and lag-free experience. This earphone uses DSP (Digital Signal Processing) and cVc (Clear Voice Capture) technology to improve sound quality, resulting in crystal clear music playback and clear and natural voice reproduction during conversations. Whether you're listening to music or making phone conversations, you'll get rich, immersive sound with incredible clarity. The Xiaomi Mi Line Free Wireless Neckband Earphone is intended to keep up with your active lifestyle. With a battery life of up to 9 hours on a single charge, you may enjoy uninterrupted listening sessions. When it's time to recharge, the earphone uses a USB Type-C connector for quick and easy charging. Whether you're commuting, working out, or simply relaxing at home, the Xiaomi Mi Line Free Wireless Neckband Earphone provides superior audio quality and unparalleled comfort, letting you to listen to your favorite music while being connected wherever you go. The Xiaomi Mi Line Free Earphone provides the greatest wireless audio experience.

full_description:
Xiaomi YDLYEJ01LM Bluetooth Sports Earphone

Mi Sports Bluetooth Earphones are engineered to be water resistant for those who want a great music experience during a workout without compromising comfort. Whether sweating it out at the gym or running through heavy rain, they are always ready for any challenge that lies ahead. Their adjustable ear hooks offer grip around your ears which assures the earbuds stay in place during workouts. With up to 7 hours of playback on a single charge and a water-resistant design, Mi Sports Bluetooth Earphones are ready to push you further even when you are running through the rain. You want your earphones to stay snug and secure even during the toughest workout. Because the ear hooks are made from a premium soft and flexible material, you can slide the adjustable hook to hold your earbuds in place. Mi Sport Bluetooth Earphones boast a large 100mAh battery which provides up to 7 hours of playback and up to 11 days of standby time. The workout doesn't stop when your earphone is low on battery a quick 10-minute charge gets you a full hour of playback time so no more excuses for missing a workout. With Mi Sports Bluetooth Earphones you can connect and pair to two different Bluetooth devices simultaneously up to 10 meters away. It is equipped with a Bluetooth 4.1 chipset which delivers crisp tones and amazing voice quality, giving you an exceptional sound experience whether you're listening to music from your laptop or picking up calls from your smartphone. The last thing you want in the middle of a workout is to reach into your pocket to pick up a call. Mi Sports Bluetooth Earphones allow you to control calls and music directly from the earbuds. The ergonomic control buttons let you access your tracks and calls in an instant, without ever needing to reach for your phone in your pocket. The earbuds feature a wear and sweat-resistant exterior to increase durability. The special silicone coating over the audio cable makes it smooth and comfortable to touch.

full_description:
Haylou PurFree BC01 Wireless Bone Conduction Headphone

The Haylou PurFree BC01 Bone Conduction Headphone offers high-quality sound via the cheekbone. Unlike over-ear headphones, the Haylou Purfree BC01 enables complete awareness of the environment as well as bud-free, comfortable listening. Our lightweight titanium frame Haylou Purfree BC01 headphones, weighing only 28g, provide unrivaled comfort. Skin-friendly silicone adds wear comfort during exercises. A fully-sealed cavity and IP67 waterproof certification can endure perspiration from high-intensity exercises, making it ideal for running, cycling, hiking, and other outdoor activities. Haylou's exclusive Directional audio technology successfully avoids sound leaking for full sound details while protecting your privacy. For crystal clear conversations, dual microphones and the CVC noise cancellation system automatically identify and eliminate background noise. It combines modern technologies and a balanced construction design to create a comfortable fit. Haylou Purfree BC01 was awarded the German Red Dot Design Award in 2022. The Haylou Purfree BC01 headphones boast a more reliable and quicker connection, as well as aptX Hi-Fi sound, thanks to the Qualcomm 3044 and Bluetooth 5.2 chip. With 8 hours of gameplay, you can listen to your music all day. The magnetic rapid charge speedily recharges the headphones. Haylou Purfree BC01 headphones may connect to two Bluetooth devices at the same time. Switch between two devices and do numerous chores with ease. The Haylou PurFree BC01 Bone Conduction Headphone comes with a 6 months warranty.
